data.title: Hobgoblins (1988)
data.meta_description: A group of hobgoblins, who allow you to live out your fantasies but kill you in the process, escape from a studio vault, and a security guard and his friends must stop them before dawn.
data.text:
I remember this making for a pretty good MST3K episode. I always loved when they would watch (at the time) recent stuff. That seemed to be a Mike thing, whereas Joel was more of a classic B-movie guy. Not a hard and fast rule by any means but just a trend I noticed as a kid. Personally, I started watching in the mid/late 90s and so I'm always gonna be a Mike guy. Huge respect to Joel, and I love a lot of his episodes, but at the end of the day Mike's my guy. I hope the internet's cooled down about this in the 23 years since I first logged on. I was, like, 10 and the second website I…

Spooky Scary Horrorthons 6 - Film #10

It pains me to give this a low score, because the hobgoblins were adorable and Daphne was hilarious with all her weird little dances and random quirks. But sadly, this is a pretty bad film.

The story is of course a horid mess. An aging security guard who has been tasked with guarding an old film studio turns out to be guarding something far more sinister, that'd be the titular hobgoblins. I like to think of this abandoned studio housing the goblins as the most horribly underfunded containment facility that the SCP Foundation has available, because it brings some much needed lore to this poor film. Eventually the Hobgoblins break loose and now…

It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.

You know, I've never actually read any...oh, wait. No. Great Expectations. I read that in college. I've been to college. Ummmmm

I really want to shoutout an I'm sorry/I'm wrong to MST3K...not like, because I like the show any more than I did last week because to be perfectly honest, I have the entire internet to give me trash movie suggestions. Sorry if that offends 'older people' or whatever but there's only so many times millennials can apologize for being born.

(Sorry the apology to MST3K is coming.) Because although I have the entire internet, what I thought was a simple search 'Hobgoblins movie band' (because I forgot…
